formore.content2: A developer with a passion for music and the little joys in life. Occasionally sings and shares favorite moments on TikTok. Loves solo coding sessions at coffee workspace. Off-duty, either gaming or having party with friends.
formore.content: I consistently work with a high sense of responsibility and am fully dedicated to contributing my best efforts to achieve the organization’s objectives. With a passion for learning and a growth-oriented mindset, I continuously enhance my expertise and skills to meet job requirements. I believe that the adaptability and energy of youth will enable me to make meaningful contributions to the team while creating valuable opportunities for career advancement.
formore.speech: Work is responsibility - Learning is passion

project.title: Project

project1.title: AI CHATBOT
project1.tech: React - Javascript, Tailwind, NodeJS, AntDesign, MongoDB
project1.description: Developed an intelligent customer support chatbot using Google's Gemini API, capable of natural language processing and automated responses.

project2.title: BOOK SALES MANAGEMENT
project2.tech: React - Typescript, Tailwind, NodeJS, AntDesign, MongoDB
project2.description: Develop a professional book sales management system with full CRUD functionality, integrated with online payment via VNPay gateway and a user-friendly interface.

project3.title: MUSIC STREAMING WEB
project3.tech: React - Javascript, Tailwind, NodeJS, AntDesign, MongoDB
project3.description: Designed and implemented a responsive music streaming website with playlist management, audio playback controls, and user authentication.
